entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
